issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: allow user agent to be overriden in XHR setRequestHeader

comments.body:
{html}

(from [52bd16ae00ee86a3de10ccb5444529e14a6489fb]) fix user-agent override issue in XHR. [#596 state:resolved] http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/52bd16ae00ee8...

{html}

{html}

XHR setRequestHeader in titanium mobile is not yet overridable.

c.setRequestHeader("User-Agent", "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.1.3) Gecko/20090824 Firefox/3.5.3 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)");
c.open('GET', url);
c.send();

125.xx.xx.12 www.xxx.com - [14/May/2010:12:12:48 +0400] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 18653 "-" "Appcelerator Titanium/1.2.0 (iPhone Simulator/3.1; iPhone OS; en_US;)"
125.xx.xx.12 www.xxx.com - [14/May/2010:12:14:52 +0400] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 18653 "-" "Appcelerator Titanium/1.2.0 (iPhone Simulator/3.1; iPhone OS; en_US;)"

{html}
